scripts.postinstall: curl -L https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp -o yt-dlp && chmod +x yt-dlp && curl -L https://johnvansickle.com/ffmpeg/releases/ffmpeg-release-amd64-static.tar.xz -o ffmpeg.tar.xz && tar -xJf ffmpeg.tar.xz && mv ffmpeg-*-amd64-static/ffmpeg ./ffmpeg && mv ffmpeg-*-amd64-static/ffprobe ./ffprobe && chmod +x ffmpeg ffprobe
